section.title: SoMono Filter
section.para: SoMono Filter is a state variable filter with a couple of extra cutoff frequency modulation capabilities. These include an LFO that goes in to audio range and an envelope follower. This machine can be used simply to cut out or boost certain frequencies or in more creative ways. For example using envelope following on drum samples in high pass mode and with resonance turned up for interesting bass boost effects. You can use the LFO for simple sweeps or crank it all the way to audio range for ring modulator type of sounds with a metallic character.
